English.Name: Ash-Sharh
Lines: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast
And We removed from you your burden
Which had weighed upon your back
And raised high for you your repute
For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease
So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship]
And to your Lord direct [your] longing

Turkish.Name: İNŞİRAH
Lines: İyiliği sonsuz, ikramı bol Allah’ın adıyla,
Demek ki her güçlüğün yanında bir kolaylık varmış!
Unutma ki o güçlüğün yanında bir kolaylık daha vardır[*].
